#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

namespace janus {



RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent>  RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                const uint64_t& term,
                                const uint64_t& candidateId,
                                const uint64_t& lastLogIndex,
                                const uint64_t& lastLogTerm,
                                bool_t* has_voted) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [has_voted, ev](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
        uint64_t ret1;
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> ret1;
        fu->get_reply() >> *has_voted;
        ev->Set(1);
        /* process the RPC response here */
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, term, candidateId, lastLogIndex, lastLogTerm, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  vector<shared_ptr<Marshallable>> cmds,
                                  vector<uint64_t> cmd_terms,
                                  vector<uint64_t> cmd_indexes,
                                  const uint64_t& leaderTerm,
                                  const uint64_t& leaderId,
                                  const uint64_t& prevLogIndex,
                                  const uint64_t& prevLogTerm,
                                  const uint64_t& leaderCommitIndex,
                                  uint64_t* followerTerm, 
                                  bool_t* appendStatus) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;


      fuattr.callback = [ev, followerTerm, appendStatus](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> *appendStatus;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      ;
      vector<MarshallDeputy> md_cmds;
      if (cmds.size() > 0) {
        for(shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd : cmds){
          MarshallDeputy md(cmd);
          md_cmds.push_back(md);
        }
      }
      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, md_cmds, cmd_terms, cmd_indexes, leaderTerm, leaderId, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, leaderCommitIndex, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::EmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  const uint64_t& leader_id,
                                  const uint64_t& leader_term,
                                  const uint64_t& prevLogIndex,
                                  const uint64_t& prevLogTerm,
                                  const uint64_t& leaderCommitIndex,
                                  uint64_t* heartbeatTerm,
                                  bool_t* heartbeatStatus) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [ev,heartbeatTerm,heartbeatStatus](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *heartbeatTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> *heartbeatStatus;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      Call_Async(proxy, Heartbeat, leader_id, leader_term, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, leaderCommitIndex, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


} // namespace janus
